description:
A strange boy enters the room and speaks to Ellee. It turns out he’s a boy named Tsubasa, a member of the Puni Bird Tribe. What is Tsubasa’s reason for not going home to Skyland?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Flightless Bird and the Strange Boy
Tobenai Tori to, Fushigi na Shounen
飛べない鳥と, ふしぎな少年
